TopicTitle: The unofficially official 0.24-Kerbapalooza Thread - Now extra #HYPETRAIN!

Articles.Content: PS If they have a way of adding notes or special requests, ask them to tell the devs it was from the community!

Looking at the Dominos website, I propose:

1 Hawaiian Pizza

1 Veggie Pizza

1 Extra Cheese Pizza

1 Pepperoni Pizza

2-liter of pepsi

2-liter of 7up

any additions?

I have to keep reminding myself price is in pesos cause seeing pizza costing $212 freaks me out

Can't have dominos without cheese bread IMHO!

Strap a SRB to that order Dominos and get it there ASAP!
The hype train should arrive at the destination today or tomorrow, but no garentees!

PS If they have a way of adding notes or special requests, ask them to tell the devs it was from the community!

I believe they'll have a "Delivery Instructions" section. Of course, it'll have to be written in Spanish, no doubt
No scratchpad builds yet today. Hm.

The hype train should arrive at the destination today or tomorrow, but no garentees!

Who knows, but this hype train is like comedy for me!
Ok...last chance to see if anyone actually knows spanish xD. I mean I'll do it if I have to since I seem to be the one people are looking at since I was looking at the menu
